prompts: Create a Pokemon that embodies light and darkness with a sleek design.
I want a legendary figure that can manipulate light and shadow in battle.
Generate a unique creature with a cosmic theme and striking black and blue colors.
Make a Pokemon that looks like it came from another dimension with sharp angles.
Imagine a mystical being that radiates energy and has a starry appearance.
Design a powerful creature with the ability to absorb light and transform.
Show me a Pokemon that represents the balance between light and dark elements.
